title: Zhiwei Xin
text: I’m Xin Zhiwei, a North China University of Technology alumnus from Beijing with a focus on cloud computing. Skilled in languages like C/C++, Java, Python, and R, and knowledgeable in data structures, Vue, and Spring Boot, I’ve interned at Kingsoft Cloud Technology as a server operations engineer, enhancing my data processing and problem-solving capabilities. Currently pursuing a Master’s in MSCA at UIC, I aim to leverage my technical expertise and experience in data analysis roles, contributing significantly to decision-making and data analysis fields.

title: resume
text:
Education Cloud Computing Technology and Application (2018.09-2021.07) Computer Science and Technology (2021.09-2023.07) Attended the University of Science & Technology Beijing and North China University of Technology. Ranked top 5% in professional achievements and first in school entrance score. Main courses included Advanced Mathematics, Networking Technology, Network Management, Python Programming, Java, SQL Server, and more. Graduation projects: Application of Cloud Computing in the Internet of Things College Student Dormitory Management System Based on Springboot+Vue
Experiences Internship at Kingsoft Network Technology Company Position: Server Operations Development Engineer Responsibilities: Maintained cloud platform service, handled faults, maintained OpenStack cloud platform components, carried out daily inspections, and compiled operation and maintenance automation scripts.
Projects Application of Cloud Computing in the Internet of Things: Explored cloud computing applications in IoT, focusing on enhancing connectivity and data processing. College Student Dormitory Management System Based on Springboot+Vue: Developed a comprehensive dormitory management system, showcasing skills in web development and database management.
